settings.jqtabs.code:
<script language='javascript' type='text/javascript'>  jQuery(document).ready(function(){
jQuery('#tabs').tabs({ cookie: { expires: 30 } });
});
</script>
settings.lightboxgallerytemplate.name: jquerylightboxgallery.template
settings.lightboxtemplate.name: jquerylightbox.template
settings.ordersreport.subject: Order Report

settingstext.courierpost.tracktemplate: <a title="Click to trace this delivery" href="http://(your-courier-company-tracking-page)/[TAG:TRACKINGCODE]" target="_blank" >[TAG:TRACKINGCODE]</a>
settingstext.emptycart.text: <div style="padding:60px 0;text-align:center"><h3>Your basket is empty</h3><a href="/tabid/[Setting:store.tab]/Default.aspx" >Return to store</a></div>
settingstext.jquerylightbox.template: <a title="[Product:ImageDesc]" rel="GRP1" class="jquerylightbox" href="[Product:ImageURL]"><img class="Image" alt="[Product:ImageDesc]" src="[Product:ImageThumb]" border="0" /></a>
settingstext.merchantlogo.template: <img src="http://www.mydomain.com/Portals/XX/path-to-logo-graphic.jpg" alt="Type your company name here" border="0" />
settingstext.minimumcarttotal.text: <p>Minimum total purchase value has not been reached. Please continue shopping.</p>
settingstext.nowishlist.template: <div style="padding:60px 0;text-align:center"><h3>You have nothing on your Wishlist</h3><a href="/tabid/[Setting:store.tab]/Default.aspx" >Return to store</a></div>
settingstext.paymentSECURITY.text: <p>We are sorry - A problem has occurred.</p> <p>Please contact the website administrator.</p>
settingstext.productlimit.text: <strong>Product Limit has been Reached.</strong><br/> To add a new product you must first remove an existing one or contact support for assistance.
settingstext.soldoutimg.template: <img alt="Product is Sold Out" class="SoldOutOverlay" src="/Desktopmodules/nb_store/img/SoldOutTab-en.png" border="0" /> <!-- This template is not used in the default 2.2 product display templates -->
settingstext.stgheader5.template: <img src="/DesktopModules/NB_Store/img/CheckoutStepLight-5.png" class="CheckoutSteps" alt="Purchase complete - Thank you" border="0" />

NB_Store_SQLReportInfo.SQL: select top 10 OrderDate,OrderNumber,AddressName as [Name],convert(decimal(16,2),Total) As Total, OrderStatusText as Status from {databaseOwner}{objectQualifier}NB_Store_Orders as O inner join {databaseOwner}{objectQualifier}NB_Store_OrderStatus as OS on OS.OrderStatusID = O.OrderStatusID and Lang= 'XX' inner join {databaseOwner}{objectQualifier}NB_Store_Address as AD on AD.AddressID = O.BillingAddressID where OrderNumber != '' and O.PortalID = @PortalID order by OrderDate Desc
select count(OrderID) as [Order Count] from {databaseOwner}{objectQualifier}NB_Store_Orders where PortalID = @PortalID and OrderNumber != ''
select convert(decimal(16,2),sum(Total)) as [Order Total] from {databaseOwner}{objectQualifier}NB_Store_Orders where Portalid = @PortalID and OrderNumber != ''
select count(ProductID) as [Product Count] from {databaseOwner}{objectQualifier}NB_Store_Products where Archived = 0 and IsDeleted = 0 and PortalID = @PortalID

select SearchWord, ExistsOnProduct, ExistsCount, LastHitDate, sum(HitCount) as HitCount, min(WordRank) as BestRank
from {databaseOwner}{objectQualifier}NB_Store_SearchWords AS SW inner join {databaseOwner}{objectQualifier}NB_Store_SearchWordHits as SWH on SWH.SearchWordID = SW.SearchWordID
where Hitdate between @Start_Date and @End_Date and PortalID = @PortalID
group by SearchWord, ExistsOnProduct, ExistsCount, LastHitDate
order by sum(HitCount) desc
